detaileddescription.para:
Create a roller object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new roller
copy
pointer to a roller object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created roller

Set the options on a roller
roller
pointer to roller object
options
a string with ' ' separated options. E.g. "One\nTwo\nThree"
inf
True: Loop through the options
Set the options on a roller
roller
pointer to roller object
options
a string with ' ' separated options. E.g. "One\nTwo\nThree"

Set the align of the roller's options (left, right or center[default])
roller
- pointer to a roller object
align
- one of lv_label_align_t values (left, right, center)
Set the align of the roller's options (left or center)
roller
- pointer to a roller object
align
- one of lv_label_align_t values (left, right, center)

Set the selected option
roller
pointer to a roller object
sel_opt
id of the selected option (0 ... number of option - 1);
anim
LV_ANOM_ON: set with animation; LV_ANIM_OFF set immediately
Set the selected option
roller
pointer to a roller object
sel_opt
id of the selected option (0 ... number of option - 1);
anim_en
LV_ANIM_ON: set with animation; LV_ANOM_OFF set immediately

Set the height to show the given number of rows (options)
roller
pointer to a roller object
row_cnt
number of desired visible rows

Set a fix width for the drop down list
roller
pointer to a roller obejct
w
the width when the list is opened (0: auto size)

Set the open/close animation time.
roller
pointer to a roller object
anim_time
open/close animation time [ms]

Set a style of a roller
roller
pointer to a roller object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to a style

Get the id of the selected option
roller
pointer to a roller object
id of the selected option (0 ... number of option - 1);

Get the current selected option as a string
roller
pointer to roller object
buf
pointer to an array to store the string
buf_size
size of buf in bytes. 0: to ignore it.

Get the align attribute. Default alignment after _create is LV_LABEL_ALIGN_CENTER
roller
pointer to a roller object
LV_LABEL_ALIGN_LEFT, LV_LABEL_ALIGN_RIGHT or LV_LABEL_ALIGN_CENTER

Get the options of a roller
roller
pointer to roller object
the options separated by ' '-s (E.g. "Option1\nOption2\nOption3")

Get the open/close animation time.
roller
pointer to a roller
open/close animation time [ms]

Get the auto width set attribute
roller
pointer to a roller object
true: auto size enabled; false: manual width settings enabled

Get a style of a roller
roller
pointer to a roller object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style
